org.apache.ambari.server.scheduler

Class AbstractLinearExecutionJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.scheduler.AbstractLinearExecutionJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionJob, org.quartz.Job
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchRequestJob

    public abstract class AbstractLinearExecutionJob
extends Object
implements ExecutionJob
    Job that knows how to get the job name and group out of the JobDataMap using pre-defined keys (constants) and contains code to schedule the identified job. This abstract Job's implementation of execute() delegates to an abstract template method "doWork()" (where the extending Job class's real work goes) and then it schedules the follow-up job.
